ComicInfo.Title: Rockin’ Rollin’ Miner Ants (feat. The TMNT); Spaced Out Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
Rockin’ Rollin’ Miner Ants (feat. The TMNT): Scorn sets a trap for the Rockin' Rollin' Miner Ants, as well as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and a trap door opens, plummeting all of them into a pit.
Spaced Out Part 3: While the military attempt to unlock the secrets of the alien spacecraft, Raphael is helping Nim and Rod to retrieve it.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-27 12:03:42. [CVDB159043] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 18:55:16. [Issue ID 245508]
